title: Context-Centered Gamification Design for Mathematics Education in EMI (English as a Medium of Instruction) Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematical concepts and intermediate-level English reading skills
context.additional_context: Context-based vocabulary learning and gamification optimized for EMI (English as Medium of Instruction) classes in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use over 80% of essential English vocabulary for solving mathematical problems in an EMI (English as a Medium of Instruction) environment.
Learners improve accuracy in solving math concept application problems by over 70% through gamification activities.
Learners are assessed on their ability to use mathematical vocabulary contextually in authentic situations (authentication tasks).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
